name: Guardian of the Seas
description:
Game created by 3 persons in 3 days for LD46 with the theme "Keep it Alive".

You are coast guard and you must resolve problems in the ocean. Boats may have accidents and you must rescue them. Criminals will try to traffic drugs and you must stop them. Keep them alive and make the ocean a save place. If your boss get angry, you are going to be fired and the game ends.

Survive as long as you can. You can upgrade your boat to make your labor easier. How to play:
  • Controls:
    • Press MouseButton1 click to move.
    • Press F to interact.
    • Press Esc to pause.
  • Objectives:
    • Survive as long as possible. If a shipwreck survivor die, a criminal escape or you crash another boat, your boss will be angry.
    • Rescue shipwreck survivors and capture criminals. Your boat have limited cargo capacity so you will have to take them to the correct building of the port (one is for survivors, the other one is for criminals). You will obtain money per rescued or arrested person.
    • You mustn’t anger your boss. If your boss gets too angry you will be fired and the game ends.
    • You can upgrade your ship with money in the dock of the port. You can upgrade your speed and your cargo capacity. It’s very useful.
Post-Jam Update (21/4/20):
  • Bug-fixing.
  • Improvements in difficulty and game balance.
